nodes.text: Carl Norn was a male technician living during the Great Galactic War, who owned the starship Bloodshot Rancor. Norn made his friend Andronikos Revel first mate on the ship and got him into pirate racket, though Norn eventually lost the ship due to gambling problems. In 3643 BBY Norn contacted Andronikos regarding a gambling debt and Revel settled his problems with a few well-aimed blaster shots.
Carl Norn is mentioned in Star Wars: The Old Republic during the Andronikos Revel companion storyline.
